alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN YORK ...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 950 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Langley AFB, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Hampton University, Langley AFB, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Northampton, Denbigh, Buckroe Beach, Tabb, Fort Monroe, Beaconsdale, Grand View, Fox Hill, Phoebus, Langley View, Oriana, Hilton Village, Raleigh Terrace, and Dare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Virginia.
